title: The Highwayman Came Riding
description: When the Grey Cavalier is once more robbing coaches near the village of Oaksley, the populace is up in arms -- with joy. But when the mysterious Mr. Dalrymple arrives to investigate, the nefarious schemes of a certain young lady come crashing down about her ears.The Counterfeit Cavalier is a sweet Regency story presented in serial form. Episode One is 22 pages or 6740 words.
author: Lydia M. Sheridan
